title: News24.com | From lockdown to quarantine to lockdown: Ramaphosa sends repatriates on a new mission as they head home
description: "If we ever had evangelists of a lockdown, you are our best evangelists," President Cyril Ramaphosa has told 112 South Africans who were repatriated from Wuhun, China, amid the novel coronavirus outbreak.
content:
"If we ever had evangelists of a lockdown, you are our best evangelists."
This was what President Cyril Ramaphosa had to say to a lively group of 112 South Africans, who were quarantined at The Ranch Resort in Polokwane after they were repatriated from Wuhun… [+2988 chars]
